entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
